long_description: The essential protection of the Smith Holt snow helmet lets you hit kickers, ride rails and land jumps with an added measure of security. Injection-molded ABS plastic construction offers high durability. Ventilation system maximizes airflow to reduce performance-inhibiting goggles fogging. Removable strap on the back secures goggles to the helmet. Ear pads are soft and comfortable; remove the pads on warm days or to wash. Convertible Pad Kit lets you remove the insulation and switch out the pads, making the helmet suitable for summertime skateboarding. Smith Holt snow helmet is compatible with Skullcandy(TM) Bluetooth(R) Audio Drop Ins, Direct Connect, and Single Shot audio systems, sold separately. This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
